topicSummary: Plantar fasciitis is a condition in which there is persistent foot pain associated with chronic degenerative and reparative processes

latestChanges.title: Minor update
latestChanges.body: Following an enquiry, the basis for recommending referral for consideration of extracorporeal shockwave therapy has been clarified.

latestChanges.title: Minor update
latestChanges.body: Link inserted to the CKS topic on Analgesia - mild-to-moderate pain.

latestChanges.title: Reviewed
latestChanges.body: A literature search was conducted in August 2013 to identify evidence-based guidelines, UK policy, systematic reviews, and key RCTs published since the last revision of the topic. Minor changes to clinical recommendations have been made.
